Player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is used to create players, and has all the functionality related to a player like reinforcement, attacking and fortification.
    Since:
    2018-10-27
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mandeep Ahlawat

      static class  Player.GamePhase
      The game Phase that can be used by a player in the game

        Parameters:
        fromCountry - is a string value in which a player can mention to move a army from a country.
        toCountry - is a string value in which a player can mention to move a army from a country to another country.
        Returns:
        true if the given condition satisfies.

        input provided in the method which is initialized to zero.

      • attack

        public void attack()
        The method will implement the attack phase. attackDone if all territories are conquered or attack lost. gameCompleted if all territories are conquered.

      • fortification

        public void fortification()
        fortification method to allow a player to move one of his armies from one country he owns to another that is adjacent to it.
